name: URBAN TRIAL FREESTYLE
description:
"Genuinely engrossing experience" DigitalChumps.com

The ultimate urban trial freestyle game for Nintendo 3DS is out now!

Take to the streets on your freestyle trials bike, using the urban landscape to pull spectacular tricks -backflips, 360s, wallrides, ollies, and more.

Customize your bike to boost your performance. Choose between speed and style, developing your own unique riding style. With the level editor, you can create your own trial tracks for endless hours of fun!

The city is your playground! Enjoy your first taste of Urban Trial Freestyle.
disclaimer: You may need an additional compatible SD card or SDHC card with available space to download this software. Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
